timeline.bodyText: Could you look at how the constraint edge is implemented? It does not add all the possible source/target mapping.
timeline.author: minhtutonthat

replies.bodyText: Oops. Sorry that's normal when you import the tool into other diagrams, these sourceMappings are added automatically.
replies.author: minhtutonthat
